name: Oh'jo the Pupil
description:
Oh'jo the Pupil is a 2.5D platform game with an infinite procedurally generated map. To advance, the player must use the different abilities of Oh'jo to eliminate the enemies that he meets.

Oh'jo is an apprentice magician of the Great Wizard Irisdalf Pupilagris who can collect Spell Items from enemys to unlock several spells and get the highest score possible!
